subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to `1`, will send updates whenever there is an update to P2P settings.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
